 O O

 O O

corporate O O
network O O
 O O
and O O
download O O
data O O

. O O

The O O
integration O O
for O O
Sterling O O
is O O
a O O
two O O
- O O
way O O
integration O O
to O O
support O O
the O O
investigation O O
and O O
confirm O O

accuracy O O
of O O
background O O
information O O
provided O O
by O O
selected O O
candidates O O
who O O
have O O
received O O
have O O

passed O O
phone O O
screening O O
& O O
or O O
accepted O O
verbal O O
offers O O
of O O
employment O O
. O O
 O O
Boomi O O
is O O
the O O
middle O O
ware O O
between O O
success O O
factor O O
and O O
sterling O O
systems O O
. O O
 O O
Boomi O O
sender O O
interface O O
picks O O
up O O
the O O
profiles O O
from O O
SF O O
and O O
send O O
to O O
sterling O O
for O O
background O O
 O O
verification O O
. O O
After O O
receiving O O
request O O
from O O
boomi O O
sterling O O
will O O
send O O
synchronous O O
response O O
with O O
an O O
 O O
Oder O O
number O O
, O O
which O O
will O O
be O O
updated O O
to O O
SF O O
synchronously O O
. O O
After O O
some O O
time O O
boomi O O
receiver O O
process O O
 O O
( O O
listener O O
process O O
) O O
receives O O
the O O
asynchronous O O
results O O
from O O
sterling O O
which O O
are O O
updated O O
back O O
to O O
SF O O
. O O
 O O
